title: Christine Lagarde - IMDb
snippet: Christine Lagarde. Self: Inside Job. Christine Madeleine Odette Lagarde is a French politician and lawyer who has been serving as President of the European Central Bank since 2019. She previously served as Managing Director of the International Monetary Fund from 2011 to 2019.

title: Christine Lagarde | Biography, IMF, ECB, & Facts | Britannica
snippet: 16, 2025 •History Table of Contents ... Christine Lagarde (born January 1, 1956, Paris, France) is a French lawyer and politician who was the first woman to serve as France’s finance minister (2007–11), as the managing director of the International Monetary Fund (IMF; 2011–19), and as president of the European Central Bank (2019– ).
